message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

This paper proposes a novel approach for learning better embeddings for text generation, which is a common task in natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also introduces a Bayesian composition of embeddings and learned kernels to capture the closeness of words in the embedding space, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning and statistics. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper may also be relevant to cs.CV (Computer Vision) since text generation is often used in image captioning tasks.
